name: h3
description: The 2025 Marucci Code BBCOR Baseball Bat stands out with its impressive features, designed to enhance your performance on the field. With a mid-loaded swing feel, this bat offers a balanced and powerful swing, perfect for serious players. Crafted from a robust one-piece alloy construction, the AZ75 Alloy ensures all-season durability. The innovative AV2 Knob features a harmonic dampening system, providing an improved feel with each hit. Additionally, the ring-free barrel construction and multi-variable wall design expand the sweet spot, offering more forgiving off-centered performance. This bat's striking black, lime, and white colorway complements its advanced technology and design. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
